DataElement.preferredName: Person Transplant Conditioning Actual Weight Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the actual weight value, the vertical force exerted by the mass of an individual as a result of gravity adjusted for dose requirements, of a transplant recipient prior to the administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant (conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection)).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the actual weight, the vertical force exerted by the mass of an individual as a result of gravity, of a transplant recipient  prior to the administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant (conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection)).

Property.preferredDefinition:
Administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy,
to a transplant.:Existing in fact; real. (from American Heritage Dictionary):The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

Concepts.definition: Administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, to a transplant recipient prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant.  Conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection).
The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The numerical result of the determination of the vertical force exerted by the mass of an individual as a result of gravity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
